dataList.title: Zwei Section 6
dataList.content: Ah! Thou wert here, compatriot! Here, this one is thine!

dataList.title: Zwei Section 6
dataList.content: Shh, be quiet! …Oh, is this milk tea? T-Thank you kindly…
The child was taking an entrance exam for the Association.
After introductory training, the examinees are tasked with a simplified request to see if they’re fit to work for the Association.

dataList.title: Zwei Section 6
dataList.content: So, is that the important person we need to guard?
…As every City resident knows, the Hana Association is in charge of managing the grades and licenses of Fixers.
Though, that doesn’t necessarily mean every exam is directly under its jurisdiction.
Each Association holds its own tests and reports their results back to the Hana.
This child here is taking an entrance exam for the Zwei Association…
All of a sudden, he unexpectedly finds his protectee getting caught up in a fight.
Although fear and anxiety caused the child to waver…

dataList.title: Zwei Section 6
dataList.content: To watch and sit idly by is against the Zwei’s creed!
Those words, they reminded the child of what he said during the qualification test.
He then nodded quietly and went to speak.

dataList.title: Zwei Section 6
dataList.content: That’s right… We’re the Zwei, our clients’ shield.
